name: ScriptUIPen

properties.name: color
properties.longdesc: The paint color to use when the type is SOLID_COLOR. An array in the form [R, B, G, A] specifying the red, green, blue values of the color and the opacity (alpha channel) value as numbers in the range [0.0..1.0]. An opacity of 0 is fully transparent, and an opacity of 1 is fully opaque.

properties.name: theme
properties.longdesc: The name of a color theme to use for drawing when the type is THEME_COLOR. Theme colors are defined by the host application.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The pen type, solid or theme.
properties.longdesc: One of these constants: ScriptUIGraphics.PenType.SOLID_COLOR or ScriptUIGraphics.PenType.THEME_COLOR

properties.name: lineWidth
properties.description: The pixel width of the drawing line.

description: A drawing pen that defines a color and line width used to stroke paths.
longdesc: Create with ScriptUIGraphics.newPen(). Use as a value of  foregroundColor properties, and pass as an argument to drawString() and strokePath() methods.
